thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 14 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Waste Connections Names Mary Anne Whitney CFO

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Waste Connections Names Mary Anne Whitney CFO
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Waste Connections Inc:
* WASTE CONNECTIONS ANNOUNCES EXECUTIVE TRANSITION PLAN * WASTE CONNECTIONS INC - APPOINTS WORTHING JACKMAN AS PRESIDENT
* WASTE CONNECTIONS INC - APPOINTS MARY ANNE WHITNEY AS CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
* WASTE CONNECTIONS - WHITNEY WILL SUCCEED JACKMAN AS CFO
* WASTE CONNECTIONS - JACKMAN WILL SUCCEED STEVE BOUCK AS PRESIDENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
